levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ranged attacks no longer reduce ATK, target 1 more enemy, and add an additional attack that ignores <@ba.vup>{attack@def_penetrate_fixed}</> enemy DEF when target HP is below 50%
